translation.eng_Latn: Where are we now, Grandma Pug?

translation.zza_Latn: Dadîya mi pîzzaya honike ra hes kena. Wina hîna baş o.
translation.eng_Latn: Granny loves cold pizza. She s funny that way.

translation.zza_Latn: Hemê çîyê ke ma verê cû kerdî Kutik, derheqê kitaban Û hingan Û pîrikan de, la pîya, o beno yew çîyo newe!
translation.eng_Latn: All the things we have done before in Kutik, the ones about books, bees, midwives, but at the same time they are making something new!

translation.zza_Latn: Ooh ez sosîsanê ketçapinan ra hes kena!
translation.eng_Latn: And I put ketchup on my sausages!

translation.zza_Latn: Rast o, la yew tewir xeyalkerdişî de.
translation.eng_Latn: It was, in a pretending kind of way.

translation.zza_Latn: Firê şirê! Firê şirê!
translation.eng_Latn: Run away! Run!

translation.zza_Latn: Ez boya yew sirrî gêna! Pug ti sifreyî werdî het de be heta ke ez wayîr vînena.
translation.eng_Latn: (to smell) It smells like a mystery. You are at the table, I will bring the ingredients.

translation.zza_Latn: Û êdî qet înan nêwaşt ke şewqaya kaptanîye bidê xo ra.
translation.eng_Latn: And never wanted to wear a captain s hat again.

translation.zza_Latn: ... yeno vîrê to o kitabo ke ma tede embazê xo yê pisîngî, Pisînga Çeşire dîbîye?
translation.eng_Latn: ... do you remember that book we gave to our cat friend, Cheshire Cat?

translation.zza_Latn: Coka ti maskeya xo ya super-qehremanî xebitnenî Pug?
translation.eng_Latn: Is that why you are wearing yoursuper-hero mask Pug?

translation.zza_Latn: Agghh! No wezîfeyê matematîkî yo!
translation.eng_Latn: Whoa! This is a math puzzle!

translation.zza_Latn: No yew BAJARÊ şew o Kutik.
translation.eng_Latn: This is a CITY of night Dog.

translation.zza_Latn: Ceyran şî, Pug. rey-rey bajaran de wina beno.
translation.eng_Latn: It's a power-cut Pug. Theysometimes happen in cities.

translation.zza_Latn: Xerîta biwana? Ez wendişê her çîyî ra hes kena!
translation.eng_Latn: Read a map? I love reading everything!

translation.zza_Latn: Ma eşkenê aye rê yew kulawa peşmine bivirazê. Derzîna to ya deştişî estê?
translation.eng_Latn: We can make a pile of wool. Do you have any nicknames?

translation.zza_Latn: Ma do zaf bixebitîyê ke aye bivînê. (hewa boye keno) Pug, ez boya sirrêkî gêna!
translation.eng_Latn: We will look for him and find him. (sniff) Pug, it smells like a secret!

translation.zza_Latn: Ez vana qey no beno kitabê to yo favorî newe!
translation.eng_Latn: I think this might be your newfavourite book!

translation.zza_Latn: Dadîya mi pîzzaya honike ra hes kena. Wina hîna baş o.
translation.eng_Latn: Grandma loves cold pizza. That's better.

translation.zza_Latn: Çira gêrenê?
translation.eng_Latn: Why?

translation.zza_Latn: Ez zî zaf wazena embazanê neweyan bivîna la...
translation.eng_Latn: I also want to make new friends, but...

translation.zza_Latn: Dima mi ra bêrê!
translation.eng_Latn: Follow me chums!

translation.zza_Latn: ii, derheqê ey de Pug...
translation.eng_Latn: Er, about that Pug...

translation.zza_Latn: ...axirî qedîya Kutik. Û êdî seba kayê merreyan amade yo!
translation.eng_Latn: ...finished at last Dog. And ready for the mice to play on!

translation.zza_Latn: No çi cayêko weş o Pug!
translation.eng_Latn: What a beautiful place it is, Pug!

translation.zza_Latn: Û rayîr ra ma xo rê çend sandwîçan biwerê.
translation.eng_Latn: And on the way we ate some sandwiches.

translation.zza_Latn: Memanî! Çi weş o. Ez şêna se bikera şima rê?
translation.eng_Latn: Visitors! How marvelous. And what can I do for you?

translation.zza_Latn: Penguenî qijanê xo zaf nêzdîya de xo tepişenê ke înan germ bikerê.
translation.eng_Latn: Penguins hold their chicks close to them to keep them warm.

translation.zza_Latn: Ti baş î, Pug?
translation.eng_Latn: Are you all right, Pug?

translation.zza_Latn: O çî yo ke aye keno kaptan.
translation.eng_Latn: He is the captain by virtue of his brilliance.

translation.zza_Latn: Kitabê resimviraştişî seba resimviraştişî yê.
translation.eng_Latn: Drawing books are for drawing.

translation.zza_Latn: Ma ha yenê Dapîra Pug!
translation.eng_Latn: We re coming Granny Pug!

translation.zza_Latn: Mi dima bêrê! Pugo Zîrek nîşandayîşê rayîran de zaf jêhatî yo.
translation.eng_Latn: Follow me! Pug The Pointy is really good at pointing the way.

translation.zza_Latn: Çira nêkero Dapîre?
translation.eng_Latn: Why not Granny?

translation.zza_Latn: wîî! No zî planê mi de nêbî.
translation.eng_Latn: Whoa! This was not included.

translation.zza_Latn: MÎYANÊ BÊVENGÎYE...
translation.eng_Latn: IN PERFECT PEACE...

translation.zza_Latn: Şewqaya Kaptanî yo.
translation.eng_Latn: The Captains Hat.
